mapper.insert: insert into clue ( id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address ) values ( #{id}, #{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{owner}, #{company}, #{job}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{website}, #{mphone}, #{state}, #{source}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address} )
mapper.select:
select c.id, c.fullname , c.company , c.phone , c.mphone , c.source , u.name owner , c.state from clue c join user u on c.owner = u.id
c.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
c.company like '%' #{company} '%'
c.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
c.mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
c.source like '%' #{source} '%'
c.state like '%' #{state} '%'
u.owner like '%' #{owner} '%'
order by c.createTime

select c.id, c.fullname , c.company , c.appellation, c.phone , c.mphone , c.email, c.website, c.source , u.name owner , c.createBy, c.createTime, c.editBy, c.editTime, c.state, c.description, c.contactSummary, c.nextContactTime, c.address, c.job from clue c join user u on c.owner = u.id where c.id = #{id}
